architectural_notes: Crypto live-quote provider: primary CoinGecko with CoinPaprika as automatic fallback; system should automatically revert to CoinGecko when it recovers; no UI alerts when fallback is in use.

existing_features.title: Keep fallback usage silent in the UI: do not display alerts, banners, toasts, or other user-facing indicators when CoinPaprika data is being used.

Update the frontend crypto parsing/market-data layer to correctly handle the backendâ€™s fallback responses for crypto search, live price, and historical data, while preserving the existing cached-live-quote behavior (keep last successful per-symbol quote on partial failures).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add fallback crypto price data source (CoinPaprika) when CoinGecko fails; auto-switch back to CoinGecko when available; no UI alerts for fallback usage

Implement an automatic fallback to CoinPaprika for all crypto market-data HTTP outcalls when CoinGecko requests fail (network error, non-2xx response, invalid JSON, or missing expected fields), while keeping CoinGecko as the primary source.
Use CoinPaprika as the fallback provider and support automatic switching back to CoinGecko on subsequent requests once CoinGecko becomes available again (no sticky fallback mode).
